flavorText: "I can't imagine what you're feeling right now, but I'll try my best."
name: I Delight in Your Convulsions
originalText: When you set this scheme in motion, each opponent loses 3 life. You gain life equal to the life lost this way.

rulings.text: The amount of life a player can lose is not bounded by their life total. For example, if your opponents have 1, 2, and 10 life, respectively, when this scheme’s ability resolves, each of them will lose 3 life. This brings their life totals to -2, -1, and 7 life, respectively. You gain 9 life. Then the first two opponents lose the game as a state-based action. (If the first two opponents concede before the triggered ability resolves, however, you’ll gain only 3 life.)
